mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_num , e.emp_name, p.pos_name, t.team_name, d.dep_name, r.rank_name from employee e join `position` p on e.pos_num = p.pos_num join team t on e.team_num = t.team_num join `rank` r on e.rank_num = r.rank_num join departure d on t.dep_num = d.dep_num limit 10 offset #{param1}
SELECT emp_num, a.auth_num, as2.auth_name from authority a join auth_sort as2 on a.auth_num = as2.auth_num where emp_num = #{param1}
